description:
The Excaliburling story reaches its climax as Maganagi takes over Okita`s body and reveals the truth to Kusanagi. How will Gintoki respond?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`épée la plus puissante et le sabre émoussé
Saikyou no Ken to Saitei no Don
The Strongest Sword, and the Dullest Sword
